attributes.action: Cut Ties With Russia: SAY NO TO CONCENTRATION CAMPS!
attributes.additional_details:
Chechen head Ramzan Kadyrov has not only sponsored direct attacks on members of the LGBT community in his republic but has adopted a plan for “the final solution of gay issue” and opened the first concentration camp in the world for sexual minorities since Hitler did so in the 1930s, according to a Novaya gazeta investigation.

http://euromaidanpress.com/2017/04/07/kadyrov-opens-first-concentration-camp-for-gays-since-hitlers-times/
attributes.background: Today, Monday 10th April 2017, the news has broken that Russia have created a concentration camp for gay men. England and many other allies around the world have stood up to this before and as humans we have an obligation to do it again.
